item.title: My Work Guidelines
item.author: guosuiyu@gmail.com (mcsrainbow)
item.description: Good work guidelines help cultivate deep thinking and professional behavior.

item.title: Life is Short and Love is Long
item.author: guosuiyu@gmail.com (mcsrainbow)
item.description: The rest of life is precious and unpredictable, don’t let the regrets be too long.

item.title: My 2021 Year in Review
item.author: guosuiyu@gmail.com (mcsrainbow)
item.description: The most important is that I have unlocked my thirst of knowledge and could not stop learning.

item.title: Cherish the Time to Meet A Bright Future
item.author: guosuiyu@gmail.com (mcsrainbow)
item.description: I will keep this state, no more slacking off, and be positive for every beautiful day ahead.

item.title: If You Are in Full Bloom, Butterflies Will Come Naturally
item.author: guosuiyu@gmail.com (mcsrainbow)
item.description: I have renewed my confidence and enthusiasm for learning, the courage to explore the unknown, and an ever-increasing belief in a better future.
